dict.string: Headway uses your location to fetch weather data (temperature, barometric pressure) for each migraine event. This helps identify weather-related triggers. Location is only accessed when logging migraines, not in the background.
Headway reads sleep, heart rate variability, resting heart rate, step count, and menstrual cycle data to improve migraine risk predictions. All data stays on your device.
Headway may log migraine events to Apple Health so you can view your headache history alongside other health data. No other health data is modified.
